title: How would I remember a script for my YouTube video? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t. For my videos, I will Draw a mind map of topics to coverWrite notes about the stories I want to tellUse 5x3 index cards with a title and bullet points from the mibd mapMake propsPace up and down the room just practicing parts to get it in my mindShoot the takes, using the index cards between takes as a memory aid, but talk live around the bullet points.So I remember the plan, but make up the details as if I were just talking to (at?) someone Now, the bold but - make props. These help me focus delivery. For my guitar site, I made up backing tracks. So I knew what guitar techniques I would have to explain: script solved. For my coding videos, I’ll practice the skeleton app first, so I know what I have to hit live

say it and read it one sentence at a time .. try doing this while your eating so you can practice pronouncing the words. read the same sentence over and over. again don’t move on until you have it memorized also counting on each finger each word so you can try to physically remind your brain to get each hurdle to the next word so count on your hands as you go along while reading the sentence.
